articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits August 25 Fishery Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits August 25 Fishery Station
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the August 25 Fishery Station under KPA Unit 313, which has been updated to meet the requirements of the age of knowledge-based economy and a highly civilized socialist nation and is making unprecedented achievements in fishing.
					 He noted with pleasure that the fishery station has been face-lifted radically as befitting the home of making the history of big fish haul and of Tanphung fishing boats.
					
					 He went round the mosaic portraying the images of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the monument to field guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu newly built in the compound of the station, and then the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the station's history. 
					
					 He said the officials and employees of the station should always cherish the noble intention of the great leaders and realize their lifetime desire by catching more fishes for the servicepersons and civilians.
					
					 He toured different parts of the fishery station to learn in detail about its fishing, storage and modernization.
					
					 He said with great satisfaction that it is laudable that the station has worked such eye-opening miracle as catching fish equivalent to the yearly output of the past just in a day during this winter intensive fishing campaign.
					
					 He is very pleased to see the station's unloading ground, processing shop and freezing storehouses filled with fishes, he said, adding that its fishermen and their wives are patriotic families as they have made a big haul even in unfavorable conditions and all turned out in a drive for processing fishes.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the station's modernization was carried out on the highest level.
					
					 What is the most important success in its modernization drive is that the station provided a sure guarantee for supplying fresh fishes to the servicepersons and civilians in every season, he said.
					
					 The August 25 Fishery Station turned into a model and standard of the nation's fishery field and worked astounding achievements in a few years, and this is ascribable to the indomitable fighting spirit it fully displayed to implement the Party's fishing policy, he said, urging all other fishery stations across the country to actively learn from it.
					
					 He stressed the need to catch more fishes as well as strictly keep the hygienic principles in unloading, sorting, freezing, storage and supply of fishes and pay deep attention to the protection of aquatic resources.
					
					 Noting that he feels relieved to get fishy smell wafted in the compound of the fishery station, an aroma of the sea in the socialist country, he said with pleasure that it is a very wonderful and gratifying scenery.
					
					  He said that one more fairyland in the era of Songun, called "Conspicuous fish scenery", could appear in the country thanks to the fishermen devotedly implementing the Party's policy.
					
					 The officials and employees of the station are precious revolutionary comrades-in-arms helping with sincerity the Supreme Commander, he said, showing deep benevolence for them.
					
					 Then, he enjoyed a performance of an art group of the station at its cultural house.
					
					 Expressing belief that the officials and employees of the station would creditably perform their duty with a desire to greet the historic 7th WPK Congress with bigger success in fishing, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won, Jo Nam Jin and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Delegation
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a friendship delegation of Ulan Bator City of Mongolia led by Erdene Bat-Uul, governor and mayor of the city who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Mongolian Mayor
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Mongolian Mayor
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the governor and mayor of Ulan Bator City of Mongolia on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Erdene Bat-Uul, governor and mayor of the city who is leading its friendship delegation, on Monday.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of Ulan Bator City of Mongolia led by Erdene Bat-Uul, governor and mayor of the city, visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President who devoted his all to the liberation of Korea, everlasting prosperity of the nation and the global cause of independence, the guests looked round the historical relics preserved with much care at the old home of the President.
					
					 They also went round the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Mirim Riding Club, the Munsu Water Park, the Korea-Mongolia Friendship Songyo Junior Secondary School in Songyo District, etc.

articles.title: Albanian President Wishes Korean People Progress, Prosperity and Well-being
articles.content:
Albanian President Wishes Korean People Progress, Prosperity and Well-being
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Cha Kon Il, DPRK ambassador to Albania, presented his credentials to its President Bujar Nishani on Nov. 17.
					 The president said the government of Albania holds that peace and security issue on the Korean Peninsula should be settled through dialogue and negotiations in the interests of the Korean people without fail, sincerely wishing them progress, prosperity and well-being.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Awarded DPRK Order
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Awarded DPRK Order
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, was awarded the DPRK Order of Friendship 1st Class.
					 The ambassador made a positive contribution to boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Seminar Held on 70th Anniversary of GFTUK
articles.content:
Seminar Held on 70th Anniversary of GFTUK
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held by officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) on the occasion of its 70th birthday at the Central Hall of Workers on Monday.
					 President Kim Il Sung formed the GFTUK on Nov. 30, Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 Present at the seminar were officials concerned and members of the federation.
					
					 They heard the papers dealing with the tasks and ways of adding glory to the leadership exploits Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by forming and developing the GFTUK, and bringing about a fresh change in the work of the trade unions under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, Kong Son Il, manager and editor-in-chief of the Working People's Organizations Publishing House, and other speakers said in the papers that the proud path covered by the GFTUK over 70 years represents a glorious history in which a shining example was set in building a revolutionary and militant mass political organization under the warm care of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They noted the GFTUK, whose origin was provided in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, has creditably fulfilled its mission and duty before the times and revolution since its formation.
					
					 The development of the GFTUK into a well-organized militant and revolutionary political organization constitutes a shining example to be specially recorded in the history of the building of mass political organizations of workers, they stressed.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Bags Gold Medal at World Weightlifting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Bags Gold Medal at World Weightlifting Championship
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifters are proving successful at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championship being held in the U.S.
					 Kim Un Guk snatched 151 kg in the 62kg category of men's weightlifting on Nov. 22, bagging a gold medal.
					
					 He jerked 177 kg and successfully lifted 328 kg in total, winning a silver medal.

articles.title: New Kind of Suture Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Suture Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Kim Man Yu Hospital in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently developed a new kind of suture with nano silver.
					 With antibiosis stronger than existing ones, the newly-developed suture helps prevent infection and complication after surgical operation. It is considered to be highly applicable to heart operation in particular.
					
					 Its production has been put on an industrial basis.
					
					 The new suture was listed as an invention at the national exhibition of inventions and new technologies held to mark the 70th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and the national liberation.

articles.title: Teenage Programmers
articles.content:
Teenage Programmers
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The 26th National Software Contest and Exhibition recently took place in the DPRK.
					 Included in the exhibits popular among visitors were programs presented by teenage coders of the Hamhung Schoolchildren's Hall in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The programs are considered to be conducive to cognitive development of schoolchildren in different subjects like foreign language, mathematics and physics.
					
					 O Song Bok, a teacher of Ryusong Primary School in Central District, Pyongyang, said that those programs coded by the teenagers make everyone take an optimistic view of the future of the country which is growing stronger by dint of science and technology.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. Not to Distort Essence of DPRK's Proposal for Concluding Peace Treaty with It
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. Not to Distort Essence of DPRK's Proposal for Concluding Peace Treaty with It
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article denounces the U.S. for its foolish attempt to play down the DPRK's realistic and just proposal for concluding a peace treaty with it.
					 The article lays bare the injustice of the U.S. assertion that the DPRK's dismantlement of its nuclear deterrence is a prerequisite to the conclusion of the peace treaty and the black-hearted aim sought by the former in it.
					
					 The Korean war broke out due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and an issue of concluding the peace treaty was raised because of that policy, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The reality goes to prove that it is a top priority issue to replace the Armistice Agreement (AA) with the peace treaty and thus fundamentally settle the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. The conclusion of the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty is the master key to resolving all problems arising between both sides.
					
					 If the AA is replaced with the peace treaty, it will help terminate the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, the root cause of all problems, and defuse the former's nuclear threat to the latter and create climate of trust and this will naturally lead to clearing the former of all its concerns.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. persists in its stereo-typed trumpeting about "denuclearization" in quest of its cynical ploy.
					
					 The DPRK's proposal for concluding the peace treaty is now being hailed and supported by broad world public. It is unanimous in asserting that the proposal is an important initiative for establishing a lasting peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula, the world's biggest hot spot, and urging the U.S. to respond to the DPRK's proposal as soon as possible. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is shunning the offer, while working hard to play it down. That's why the U.S. is diverting public attention from this issue, deliberately twisting the nature of the situation.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to think twice, bearing in mind that adverse consequences may be entailed by its acts of turning its face away from the DPRK's proposal and insisting on its wrong assertion.

articles.title: U.S. Does Not Want to See Peace and Reunification in Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Does Not Want to See Peace and Reunification in Korea: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A high-ranking official of the U.S. Department of State at a recent briefing at the foreign press club in Washington uttered that the U.S. would neither help nor encourage the use, purchase and stockpiling of anti-personnel mines in the world except the Korean Peninsula, reiterating the will to work hard to strengthen alliance with south Korea and "defense." It is the long-standing commitment, and, therefore, the U.S. will sustain it in the future, too, he added. 
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday observes: 
					
					 This means the U.S. intention to use those mines on the Korean Peninsula at any cost, a revelation of its ulterior motive of disturbing peace and reunification and seeking permanent division of the peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. claims that the continued use of anti-personnel mines is for "defense," but this is nothing but sophism.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling igniting a war against the DPRK through a surprise preemptive attack, while watching for an opportunity. The U.S. has already deployed MRAPs in the area along the Military Demarcation Line for paving the way for invading the north any time. 
					
					 It has already been brought to light that the U.S. does not want peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula but seeks permanent division of the Korean nation and war against the DPRK and domination over the world. 
					
					 The DPRK has already warned that it is ready to react to any form of war including a nuclear war if the U.S. wants it and wipe out the invaders to the last man. The U.S. authorities would be well advised to think twice over this, if they have normal way of thinking. 
					
					 The U.S. should withdraw its aggression troops from south Korea without delay if it wants to escape the merciless retaliatory strike from the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army of the DPRK.

articles.title: Authorities' Moves to Introduce "State-compiled Textbook" Rejected by S. Korean Religious Body
articles.content:
Authorities' Moves to Introduce "State-compiled Textbook" Rejected by S. Korean Religious Body
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Justice and Peace Committee of the Catholics bishop in a statement on Nov. 19 denounced the introduction of "state-compiled" history textbook which the south Korean authorities are pressing for, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 The statement recalled the "government" and the ruling party are pressing for the introduction of the history textbook despite a recent opinion poll which said historians, civic and public circle and the majority of the people voiced opposition to the introduction.
					
					 The statement said that they are branding those standing against the history textbook as the "forces following the north" and the "leftist forces," a move to cause division among people.
					
					 The statement urged the authorities to accept the public opinion including those of the historical circle.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of People
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of People
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. including Los Angeles, New York, Washington, Chicago, Boston, Philadelphia, Texas and Seattle on Nov. 20 issued a joint statement in protest against the south Korean authorities' brutal crackdown of the all-out people's action.
					 The statement expressed serious concern and indignation at the unreasonable ceaseless moves for the revival of "yusin" in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean present regime put a peasant at his advanced age in a critical condition and indiscriminately fired water cannon at the unarmed demonstrators, a clear proof of its backwardness, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The stop to the retrogressive revision of labor law, harsh rule under the pretext of security, introduction of "state-compiled" history textbook and the salvage of ferry "Sewol" and the repeal of hostile policy toward the DPRK, etc. demanded by the protesters during their action are just the same as what is called for by the Koreans in the U.S.
					
					 The Koreans in the U.S. will fight it out against the regime enforcing policies against the living of the people, democracy and reunification for the revival of "yusin" in solidarity with conscientious forces of the U.S., to say nothing of all Koreans abroad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Belarus
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Belarus on November 19.
					 L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and chairman of the Standing Presidium of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the noble revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Indian Body Hails DPRK Proposal for Concluding Peace Treaty with U.S.
articles.content:
Indian Body Hails DPRK Proposal for Concluding Peace Treaty with U.S.
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on Nov. 17 denouncing the U.S. for shunning the DPRK's fair and aboveboard proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association condemns the U.S. for its impudent behavior of turning a deaf ear to the DPRK's proposal for defusing the danger of a war and achieving durable peace by replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					
					 The conclusion of the peace treaty would help defuse the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and achieve national reunification, the desire of the Korean people.
					
					 We demand the U.S. stop disturbing the Korean people in their efforts to avert military clashes which may spark a big disaster on the peninsula and put an end to confrontation.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is the main factor of bringing the danger of a nuclear war to Asia.
					
					 We are convinced that a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. would only guarantee peace and security in Asia.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Denounces U.S. for Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Denounces U.S. for Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) --The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles condemning the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK on its website on Nov. 16.
					 An article titled "U.S. should respond to call for concluding peace treaty" said that the special representative for North Korea Policy of the U.S. Department of State, talking about order of discussion when referring to the DPRK proposal for concluding a peace treaty, claimed that there should be important progress in the process for denuclearization before replacing the Armistice Agreement (AA) with a peace treaty.
					
					 The historical experience proved that no issue can be solved unless the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. are fundamentally settled by replacing the AA with a peace treaty, it noted, adding the U.S. should not misjudge the good faith of the DPRK but ponder over what consequences would be entailed if the former shuns it.
					
					 An article slamming the U.S. attempt to re-list the DPRK as "sponsor of terrorism" noted that the U.S. conservative forces' claim is no more than sophism of those obsessed with inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward the DPRK, urging the U.S. to immediately roll back its hostile policy toward it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan on November 18.
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party who doubles as chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting and seminar on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Empresa Pesquera 25 de Agosto
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Empresa Pesquera 25 de Agosto
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Empresa Pesquera 25 de Agosto, adscrita a la Unidad no. 313 del EPC, que se ha modernizado segun la demanda de la epoca de economia intelectual y el aspecto del pais civilizado socialista y alcanza exitos sin precedentes en la pesca.
					El Mariscal dijo que es imposible encontrarse con la figura antigua de la empresa y se mostro muy alegre de que esta quedo transformada excelentemente con el aspecto digno a la tierra natal de la creacion de historia de mar rico y de los barcos pesqueros Tanphung.
					
					Dio recorrido por la pintura con imagenes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il con amplias sonrisas recien instalada en el recinto de la empresa, el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de historial.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios y empleados de la empresa deben realizar el anhelo de vida de los grandes Lideres al enviar mucho mas pescados a los soldados y habitantes sin olvidar siempre el noble proposito de ellos.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la empresa, el Mariscal se entero en detalles del estado de la pesca, almacenamiento de pescado y la modernizacion.
					
					Durante el periodo de campana de pesca invernal la empresa crea milagro de pescar en un dia la cantidad conveniente a la productividad de un ano en el pasado, dijo y mostro muy satisfecho de que esto deviene un exito loable a todo el mundo.
					
					Dijo que esta muy alegre al ver  el desembarcadero, el lugar de procesamiento y los almacenes refrigeradores donde estan llenos de los pescados. Los pescadores trajeron la rica cosecha de los pescados aun en medio de las condiciones desfavorables y que hasta sus esposas libran la campana de procesamiento de pescados, dijo y elogio que ellos son las familias patriotas.
					
					Mostro gran satisfaccion de que la empresa realizo en el nivel supremo la modernizacion.
					
					Senalo que el exito importantisimo logrado en la remodelacion de la empresa es que se preparo la firme garantia para suministrar al pueblo los pescados frescos en todas las estaciones.
					
					La llave con que la empresa se convirtio en el modelo de la rama pesquera de nuestro pais y logro los exitos milagrosos en los unos anos ultimos, esta en haber manifestado el indoblegable espiritu de materializar a toda costa la politica pesquera del Partido, dijo y enfatizo en que todas las empresas pesqueras de todo el pais deben asimilarlo.
					
					Menciono en la necesidad de prestar la profunda atencion, ademas de capturar mucho mas los peces, a observar estrictamente las demandas higienicas en el desembarco, la coleccion, la refrigeracion, el almacenamiento y suministro y al problema de proteger los recursos maritimos.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho viendo el maravilloso monton de pescados.
					
					Dijo que los funcionarios y empleados de la empresa son valiosos y buenos camaradas de armas revolucionarios que ayudan al Comandante Supremo y dispenso gran benevolencia que sera transmitida de generacion en generacion.
					
					Presencio en la Casa Cultural la funcion de los miembros del grupo artistico de la empresa.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la empresa cumpliran con su orgullosa mision encargada con la decision de acoger el VII Congreso del PTC con los exitos de pescar mucho mas, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Jo Yong Won, Jo Nam Jin y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Portavoz de Comandancia de Frente Sudoeste de EPC advierte a capa militar surcoreana
articles.content:
Portavoz de Comandancia de Frente Sudoeste de EPC advierte a capa militar surcoreana
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano intentan de nuevo la provocacion militar olvidando su amarga derrota en el canonazo en la isla Yonphyong, el portavoz de la Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 22 una declaracion que senala:
					Como conocen todos, el canonazo de Yonphyong, ocurrido el 23 de noviembre de 2010, fue registrado como acontecimiento especial en la historia de relaciones intercoreanas al mostrar claramente el tragico destino de los provocadores enloquecidos en la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Todavia, la capa militar surcoreana recurre en la farsa para enganar la opinion publica y burlar al mundo.
					
					En lugar de sacar las lecciones de su derrota vergonzosa de hace ahora 5 anos, ella plantea volver a perpetrar el 23 en las zonas alrededores de las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong el disparo provocativo contra el agua jurisdiccional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea movilizando los armamentos como el canon de tiro parabolico de calibre de 155mm "K-9", los lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados de calibre de 130mm, el misil teledirigido tierra - tierra "Spike" y el helicoptero armado "AH-1S".
					
					Con anterioridad, la capa militar dio a la publicidad el 15 de noviembre el hecho de que la comandancia maritima "promueve el plan de cambiar el nombre oficial de la provocacion militar en la isla Yonphyong como 'el combate de canoneo de la isla Yonphyong'".
					
					Insiste en que si usa la palabra actual de la "provocacion de canonazo del Norte (de Corea) en la isla Yonphyong" pueden tildar al ejercito norcoreano del "provocador", pero es imposible borrar eternamente la queja interna y externa y el registro de su derrota vergonzosa al ser atacado unilateralmente. Por esta razon, trata de usar la palabra del "combate de canoneo" para enganar la opinion publica como si ocurriera un combate mutuo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y convertir su derrota en la "victoria".
					
					Esta farsa de las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas acarreara una consecuencia negativa mas grande.
					
					No podemos pasar por alto el hecho de que los belicistas surcoreanos declararon que "elevaran el prestigio de trato" a las victimas caidas en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Esta medida tambien persigue un objeto mal.
					
					La situacion miserable de los belicistas surcoreanos, que andan histericos por el fuerte canonazo de la RPDC, agranda mas el pesimismo sobre la guerra y la evasion del servicio militar entre los jovenes y adultos surcoreanos.
					
					Para buscar la salida de esta situacion, la capa militar decidio elevar "el prestigio de trato" para estimular a los soldados del ejercito titere al servicio militar y impulsarlos como brigada de choque en la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					He aqui el verdadero objetivo de la sustitucion del nombre del canonazo en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Nuestros oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea apreciamos la paz mas que nadie.
					
					Por eso, nunca perdonan a los que perjudican en lo minimo la paz tanto ayer como hoy.
					
					Si el dia 23 del mes en curso se perpetra en las zonas candentes del Mar Oeste el disparo maritimo de la capa militar surcoreana contra el agua jurisdiccional de la RPDC, se producira la despiadada represalia de las unidades del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea contra el agua alrededor de 5 islas.
					
					Las fuerzas belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana deben actuar con prudencia.
					
					Si ellas consideran valioso de veras el acuerdo de agosto tienen que actuar justamente.
					
					Deben sacar la leccion de su amarga derrota de hace ahora 5 anos, lejos de dedicarse a diversos ejercicios belicosos encaminados al ataque preventivo anti-RPDC.
					
					Deben conocer correctamente que el destino del provocador no se cambiara.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Ulan Bator de Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Ulan Bator de Mongolia
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam departio el dia 23 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae en un ambiente amistoso con la delegacion de amistad de la ciudad de Ulan Bator de Mongolia encabezada por Erdene Bat-Uul, gobernador y alcalde de la capital, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Presidente de Albania desea al pueblo coreano progreso, prosperidad y bienestar
articles.content:
Presidente de Albania desea al pueblo coreano progreso, prosperidad y bienestar
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Cha Kon Il, presento el dia 17 sus cartas credenciales ante el presidente de la Republica de Albania, Bujar Nishani.
					En la audiencia, el mandatario dijo que su gobierno desea que el problema de paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana se resuelva mediante el dialogo y negociaciones y conforme a los intereses del pueblo coreano, y formulo sinceros votos por el progreso, prosperidad y bienestar del pueblo coreano.
